entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with drizzle this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
